alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:53AM CDT until June 01 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOURBON AND NORTHERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 153 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Hepler, or 7 miles north of Girard, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Girard... Arcadia... Hepler... Farlington... Brazilton... Polk... Garland... Pawnee Station... Englevale... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
